title: MPIE Lecture 7: Analyzing survey data
text:
Stata code:

gen sba=0
replace sba=1 if m3a==1 | m3b==1 | m3c==1
replace sba=. if m3a==9

R code:

data$sba <- 0
data$sba[data$m3a==1 | data$m3b==1 | data$m3c==1] <- 1
data$sba[data$m3a==9] <- .
